oneOf.title: Component document
oneOf.description:
Component document collects information about a single hardware block without
expressing internal structure or hierarchy. Component document expressing following aspects:
* name, version
* top level ports
* parameter schema
* bus interfaces
* memory regions
* registers
* clocks, resets
* block generation flow
* references to implementation, documentation, tests

isClock.description: port is a clock for this bus interface

isReset.description: port is a reset for this bus interface

requiresDriver.description: specifies whether the port requires a driver when used in a completed design

defaultValue.description: default logic value for this wire port
